
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/springsource/p/18924991" title="发布于 2025-06-12 09:38">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">MCP赋能，给Cursor插上“外挂翅膀”：实战操作数据库</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p>先给大家个例子, 展示如何用mcp如何带飞cursor的. &nbsp;话不多说, &nbsp;继续展示&nbsp;</p>
<hr>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3>1、建立项目</h3>
<p data-pm-slice="3 2 []">&nbsp;</p>
<p data-pm-slice="3 2 []">提示词如下:</p>
<p data-pm-slice="3 2 []">&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<blockquote>
<p>“ 新建个java项目, 叫user-demo, &nbsp;通过spring boot、jdk8、maven方式实现 , 需要注册和登录功能. &nbsp;前端用html新增登录、注册界面, 需要链接到后端完成登录、注册的功能 ”</p>
</blockquote>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>这部分为cursor的基操, &nbsp;如即往的强大, 一堆滚屏操作后, 完美完成任务</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/323385/202506/323385-20250612084942282-473500809.png" alt="" height="723" width="704"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3 data-pm-slice="3 2 []"><span data-pm-slice="1 1 [&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;p&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;id&quot;:&quot;ucd9ae438&quot;,&quot;class&quot;:&quot;ne-p&quot;,&quot;style&quot;:&quot;margin: 0; padding: 0; min-height: 24px;&quot;,&quot;data-pm-slice&quot;:&quot;3 2 []&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;},&quot;node&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;span&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;class&quot;:&quot;ne-text&quot;,&quot;style&quot;:&quot;font-size: 16px;&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;}]">2、数据库操作</span><span data-pm-slice="1 1 [&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;p&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;style&quot;:null},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;}]">&nbsp;</span></h3>
<p><span data-pm-slice="1 1 [&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;p&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;style&quot;:null},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;}]">重要的来了, 按往常, 我们就要切屏, 去连数据库里面建立相关库、表、定义表结构, 而这里, 可我还是想用提示词</span></p>
<p>继续给提示词:</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<blockquote>
<p>“&nbsp;</p>
<p><span data-pm-slice="1 1 [&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;p&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;}]">在测试库test里面新建用户表,叫user表 必须包含 用户名、密码、手机号、以及常用的用户信息等, 非必填</span></p>
<p><span data-pm-slice="1 1 [&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;p&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;}]">”</span></p>
</blockquote>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>cursor直接给我操作数据库, 完成建库、建表<span data-pm-slice="1 1 [&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;p&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;}]">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/323385/202506/323385-20250612092623595-1869319478.png" height="436" width="708"></p>
<p><span data-pm-slice="1 1 [&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;p&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;}]">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p><span data-pm-slice="1 1 [&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;p&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;}]">我们去表里面检查, &nbsp;发现确实完成了创建 (整个过程, 我没操作过数据库)&nbsp;</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/323385/202506/323385-20250612092659924-539074045.png" height="345" width="691"></p>
<p data-pm-slice="3 2 []">&nbsp;</p>
<h3 data-pm-slice="3 2 []"><span data-pm-slice="1 1 [&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;p&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;},&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;p&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;id&quot;:&quot;ucd9ae438&quot;,&quot;class&quot;:&quot;ne-p&quot;,&quot;style&quot;:&quot;margin: 0; padding: 0; min-height: 24px;&quot;,&quot;data-pm-slice&quot;:&quot;3 2 []&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;},&quot;node&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;span&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;class&quot;:&quot;ne-text&quot;,&quot;style&quot;:&quot;font-size: 16px;&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;}]">3、插入测试数据</span></h3>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span data-pm-slice="1 1 [&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;p&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;id&quot;:&quot;ucd9ae438&quot;,&quot;class&quot;:&quot;ne-p&quot;,&quot;style&quot;:&quot;margin: 0; padding: 0; min-height: 24px;&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;},&quot;node&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;span&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;class&quot;:&quot;ne-text&quot;,&quot;style&quot;:&quot;font-size: 16px;&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;}]">完美, &nbsp;此时我们需要点测试数据.&nbsp;</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span data-pm-slice="1 1 [&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;p&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;id&quot;:&quot;ucd9ae438&quot;,&quot;class&quot;:&quot;ne-p&quot;,&quot;style&quot;:&quot;margin: 0; padding: 0; min-height: 24px;&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;},&quot;node&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;span&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;class&quot;:&quot;ne-text&quot;,&quot;style&quot;:&quot;font-size: 16px;&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;}]">继续给cousor提示词:</span></p>
<p><span data-pm-slice="1 1 [&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;p&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;id&quot;:&quot;ucd9ae438&quot;,&quot;class&quot;:&quot;ne-p&quot;,&quot;style&quot;:&quot;margin: 0; padding: 0; min-height: 24px;&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;},&quot;node&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;span&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;class&quot;:&quot;ne-text&quot;,&quot;style&quot;:&quot;font-size: 16px;&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;}]">&nbsp;</span></p>
<blockquote>
<p>"&nbsp;</p>
<p>帮我直接连接测试库, 然后手动插入5条测试数据, admin1 都 admin5, 密码都是123456a&nbsp;</p>
<p>"</p>
</blockquote>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>要求cursor手工插入, &nbsp;它继续操作</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/323385/202506/323385-20250612092758627-1342455988.png" height="421" width="670"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>检查下数据库, &nbsp;测试数据自动完成</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/323385/202506/323385-20250612092838374-334462153.png" height="180" width="663"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>完成, 大家可以关注下, 整个例子中, &nbsp;cursor里面和以往不一样的地方, &nbsp;主要在于 , &nbsp;CALL MCP TOOL, &nbsp;是的, &nbsp;就是MCP连接数据库了.&nbsp;</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/323385/202506/323385-20250612092901151-1275250628.png" height="173" width="670"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<hr>
<p data-pm-slice="3 2 []">&nbsp;</p>
<h3 data-pm-slice="3 2 []"><span data-pm-slice="1 1 [&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;p&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;id&quot;:&quot;ucd9ae438&quot;,&quot;class&quot;:&quot;ne-p&quot;,&quot;style&quot;:&quot;margin: 0; padding: 0; min-height: 24px;&quot;,&quot;data-pm-slice&quot;:&quot;3 2 []&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;},&quot;node&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;span&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;class&quot;:&quot;ne-text&quot;,&quot;style&quot;:&quot;font-size: 16px;&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;}]">如何配置的?&nbsp;</span></h3>
<p data-pm-slice="3 2 []">&nbsp;</p>
<p>cursor用的mcp-server , 这个其实是自己写的, 官方也有类似的, 我的git地址:</p>
<p><a href="https://github.com/bensonHe/baoziAI-MCPServer-demo/tree/master/python-mysql" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/bensonHe/baoziAI-MCPServer-demo/tree/master/python-mysql</a></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>需要在cursor里配置, command+shift+P, 打开配置 mcp配置</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/323385/202506/323385-20250612093019960-1580586241.png" height="377" width="628"></p>
<p>配置如下改成你的电脑路径:</p>
<pre class="language-json highlighter-hljs"><code>
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "mysql-server": {
      "command": "/Users/baozi/vxproject/baoziAI-MCPServer-demo/python-mysql/venv/bin/python",
      "args": ["/Users/baozi/vxproject/baoziAI-MCPServer-demo/python-mysql/mysql_mcp_server.py"]
    }
  }
}</code></pre>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<hr>
<h3 data-pm-slice="3 2 []">&nbsp;</h3>
<h3 data-pm-slice="3 2 []"><span data-pm-slice="1 1 [&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;p&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;},&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;p&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;id&quot;:&quot;ucd9ae438&quot;,&quot;class&quot;:&quot;ne-p&quot;,&quot;style&quot;:&quot;margin: 0; padding: 0; min-height: 24px;&quot;,&quot;data-pm-slice&quot;:&quot;3 2 []&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;},&quot;node&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;span&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;class&quot;:&quot;ne-text&quot;,&quot;style&quot;:&quot;font-size: 16px;&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;}]">只限于此吗?&nbsp;</span></h3>
<p data-pm-slice="3 2 []">&nbsp;</p>
<p data-pm-slice="3 2 []"><span data-pm-slice="1 1 [&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;p&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;},&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;p&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;id&quot;:&quot;ucd9ae438&quot;,&quot;class&quot;:&quot;ne-p&quot;,&quot;style&quot;:&quot;margin: 0; padding: 0; min-height: 24px;&quot;,&quot;data-pm-slice&quot;:&quot;3 2 []&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;},&quot;node&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;span&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;class&quot;:&quot;ne-text&quot;,&quot;style&quot;:&quot;font-size: 16px;&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;}]">当然不是, 这里仅仅是数据库的操作引入, &nbsp;借一幅网图, 我上面展示的就是MCP Sercer A的链路,&nbsp;<span data-pm-slice="1 1 [&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;section&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;&quot;},&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;p&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;id&quot;:&quot;uaff3f06c&quot;,&quot;class&quot;:&quot;ne-p&quot;,&quot;style&quot;:&quot;margin: 0; padding: 0; min-height: 24px;&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;},&quot;node&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;span&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;class&quot;:&quot;ne-text&quot;,&quot;style&quot;:&quot;font-size: 16px;&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;}]">通过cursor去添加mcp server ,完成了对数据库的操作.</span></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/323385/202506/323385-20250612093246555-1434947651.png" height="403" width="589"><br>其中还有Remote service, 这个想象力就大了, 如:</p>
<p>通过高德/百度地图自动规划路线</p>
<p>读取你的gitlab代码</p>
<p>读取你的程序日志&nbsp;</p>
<p>... ...</p>
<p>只有你想不到的, 没有做不到, &nbsp;简单说就是链接一切,</p>
<p>我认为是MCP协议库, 大家可以先简单看下当前MCP有多少功能, 分享几个资源站</p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li>
<p>&nbsp;mcp资源站:&nbsp; <span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Smart Quotes&quot;, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;Source Han Sans SC&quot;, &quot;Noto Sans CJK SC&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif">http://mcp.so/</span></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><span data-pm-slice="1 1 [&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;section&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;},&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;p&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;}]">cursor官方站:&nbsp; </span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Smart Quotes&quot;, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;Source Han Sans SC&quot;, &quot;Noto Sans CJK SC&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif">https://github.com/modelcontextprotocol/servers&nbsp;</span></p>
</li>
</ul>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li>
<p>阿里云的mcp市场:&nbsp; <span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Smart Quotes&quot;, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;Source Han Sans SC&quot;, &quot;Noto Sans CJK SC&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif">https://bailian.console.aliyun.com/?tab=mcp</span></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>应用端, &nbsp;也不止是corsor, &nbsp;MCP为通用模型, &nbsp;所有大模型都适用.&nbsp;</p>
<p>如: &nbsp;桌面的 vscode插件 clien、 阿里的百炼大模型也提供接入等.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<hr>
<h3 data-pm-slice="3 2 []"><span data-pm-slice="1 1 [&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;section&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;&quot;},&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;p&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;id&quot;:&quot;ucd9ae438&quot;,&quot;class&quot;:&quot;ne-p&quot;,&quot;style&quot;:&quot;margin: 0; padding: 0; min-height: 24px;&quot;,&quot;data-pm-slice&quot;:&quot;3 2 []&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;},&quot;node&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;span&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;class&quot;:&quot;ne-text&quot;,&quot;style&quot;:&quot;font-size: 16px;&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;}]">最后</span></h3>
<p>作为一名从业 16 年的老程序员，我始终保持对新技术的好奇和热情。</p>
<p>这次开始探索 AI 编程，也算是一次“与时代同步”的尝试。</p>
<p>我会继续用实战案例，和大家一起摸索如何真正把 AI 落地到日常开发中。</p>
<p>说实话, 我现在很好奇, AI是否会颠覆软件工程, 在不久未来 “一个人 + AI” 以后是否真能干翻一个小团队, &nbsp;哈哈, &nbsp;如果你也感兴趣，欢迎关注我, 一起向前探索。</p>
<p>留下公众号</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/323385/202505/323385-20250522181147643-468020581.png" alt="" height="118" width="133"></p>
</div>
